tube.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a round pipe made of metal, glass, rubber etc, especially for liquids or gases to go through
tube.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a long hollow object that is usually round
tube.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a narrow container made of plastic or soft metal and closed at one end, that you press between your fingers in order to push out the soft substance that is inside
tube.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a tube-shaped part inside your body
tube.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: the part of a television that produces the picture on the screen
tube.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to float on a river on a large inner tube for fun
